https://codeberg.org/tarleb/querverweis
crossreferences for markdown documents https://github.com/pandoc-ext/info
collection of misc lua filters https://github.com/topics/pandoc-filter
github search for pandoc filters https://github.com/jez/pandoc-sidenote
Tufte-style sidenotes, to be used together with https://edwardtufte.github.io/tufte-css/ or https://github.com/jez/pandoc-markdown-css-theme

  • Tufte-style sidenotes, to be used together with https://edwardtufte.github.io/tufte-css/ or https://github.com/jez/pandoc-markdown-css-theme
title: Pandoc lua filters
